lead_paragraph: More than 400,000 glass knobs that can break while in use are being recalled this week. Other recalled consumer products include pool slides, recreational vehicles, baby jackets and rattles.
snippet: More than 400,000 glass knobs that can break while in use are being recalled this week. Other recalled consumer products include pool slides, recreational vehicles, baby jackets and rattles....

headline.main: Factbox: Findings of Senate Tax Probe a Focus of IRS Search at Caterpillar
